title: Firefox for Android 28.0.1 Release

notes.note:
28.0.1 No H.264 video playback on several Galaxy devices ([963612][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=963621
More native text selection, cut, and copy
Awesomebar entries now trigger predictive lookup
Added settings switch to toggle dynamic toolbar mode
Now that spdy/3 is implemented support for spdy/2 has been removed and servers without spdy/3 will negotiate to http/1 without any penalty
Support for multi-line flexbox in layout

Explore By Touch automatically loading web pages ([963000][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=963000

Crashes interacting with the back button on x86 tablets Galaxy Tab 3 10.1 (see [983211][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=983211
Moving Firefox to background while playing a flash video in full screen mode and bring it back to view will freeze the app (see 809055)

Some devices running Android 4.3/4.4 may experience playback problems with embedded h.264 video (see [984230][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=984230

text:
Check out "What’s New" and "Known Issues" for this version of Firefox below. As always, you’re encouraged to [tell us what you think][1], or [file a bug in Bugzilla][2].

We'd also like extend a special thank you to all of the [new Mozillians][3] who contributed to Firefox 28!!


  [1]: http://input.mozilla.com/feedback
  [2]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/
  [3]: https://blog.mozilla.org/community/2014/03/13/firefox-28-new-contributors/
